main.name: Vinod Darapu
main.shortDesc: Skilled Cloud and DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of IT experience, in supporting, automating, and optimizing mission critical deployments in AWS and Azure clouds, leveraging configuration management, CI/CD, and DevOps processes.

about.title: Cloud & DevOps Engineer
about.about: A Cloud & DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in designing, automating, and managing enterprise-scale infrastructures across AWS and Azure. Proven expertise in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform and Ansible to provision secure, scalable, and cost-optimized cloud environments. Possesses a strong background in CI/CD pipeline engineering using tools like Jenkins, Octopus, and Copado for automated deployments of both modern and legacy applications. Experienced in monitoring with Dynatrace and ELK, and knowledgeable in Windows/Linux server administration, security best practices, and agile methodologies.

projects.name: Project Title
projects.techstack: PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript

desc: Led cloud migration initiatives using Agile (2-week sprints) and GitHub for collaboration, accelerating delivery cycles and boosting team productivity.

Collaborated with Enterprise Architecture, Business Partners, Developers, Middleware, Security, and Project Managers to design and implement scalable, highly available, and compliant cloud architectures.
Designed and deployed ELK stack for enterprise-wide log management and monitoring.
Built end-to-end CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins, integrating automated testing and deployment workflows, reducing release time from days to hours.
Applied Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform to provision AWS and Azure infrastructure, achieving repeatable and cost-optimized deployments.
Administered and supported Windows Server environments, ensuring reliability of legacy business-critical applications.
Streamlined DevOps operations by optimizing build/release automation, source code management, and defect/change tracking using JIRA.
Implemented Copado workflows for Salesforce deployments.
Automated legacy application deployments on Windows Server/IIS using Octopus Deploy.
Deployed Dynatrace for performance and log/network monitoring, improving observability.
Passed all compliance audits by enforcing best security practices.
Designed and deployed highly available, fault-tolerant architectures across AWS and Azure, provisioning networking, compute, IAM, and storage resources using Terraform (IaC).
Automated infrastructure builds using Terraform + Ansible, enabling consistent and repeatable deployments across multiple environments.
Supported 100+ Azure instances, optimizing costs with Reserved Instances, tagging for cost analysis, and storage lifecycle management.
Strengthened security by managing Azure AD, Key Vaults, Service Principles, and RBAC policies, ensuring compliance with organizational standards.
Administered 300+ Windows and Linux servers in mixed VMware/physical environments, including Active Directory, O365, SCCM patching, clustering, and SQL environments.
Migrated and modernized legacy workloads to cloud environments, reducing reliance on on-premises data centers.
Used Agile methodology (Scrum, 2-week sprints) and tools such as JIRA, VersionOne, GitHub, and ServiceNow for sprint planning, tracking, and delivery management.
